text: Hugo Maradona (9 May 1969 - 28 December 2021) was an Argentine football player. He was the brother of footballer Diego Maradona. Maradona died on 28 December 2021 in Monte di Procida, Italy from a heart attack, aged 52. ==Club career statistics== |- |1992||rowspan="3"|PJM Futures||Regional Leagues||12||7||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||12||7 |- |1993||rowspan="2"|Football League||16||7||0||0||colspan="2"|-||16||7 |- |1994||21||17||1||0||colspan="2"|-||22||17 |- |1995||Fukuoka Blux||Football League||27||27||3||0||colspan="2"|-||30||27 |- |1996||Avispa Fukuoka||J.
